# isDisplayingRepresentativeItem

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the representative item is showing in place of the group’s items.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isDisplayingRepresentativeItem: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the representative item is being displayed in the shortcuts bar. The value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] when the individual bar button items are being displayed in the shortcuts bar.

## Determining the group’s appearance

- **isHidden**: A Boolean that determines the visibility of the group.
